name: Monarch Sanctuary Alfred
effect:
[CONT](VC):All of your "Blaster Blade" on (RC) or (GC) get [Power] +10000/[Shield] +5000.

name: Pentagonal Magus
effect:
[CONT](VC):The [Power] increase of trigger effects revealed for your drive check get +5000.

Then, [COST][discard the same number of cards from your hand as the number of your opponent's rear-guards], and at the end of that battle, [Stand] this unit, and it gets [Power] +5000/drive -1 until end of turn.
